ja456:5.4: Gantabbamāhu → gantabyamāhu (mr), dvipadindaseṭṭha → dipadānaseṭṭha (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | dvipadānaseṭṭha (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja456:9.4: ca kho → pubbeva kho (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja456:12.2: Sārāṇiyaṃ → sāraṇīyaṃ (mr), vītisārayimha → vītisārimha (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja456:14.1: Bālāva → bālā ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
